UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Design of antimicrobial peptide arenicin analogs with improved therapeutic indices.
Literature.Author: Panteleev PV, Bolosov IA, Balandin SV, Ovchinnikova TV

Literature.Title: Dimerization of the antimicrobial peptide arenicin plays a key role in the cytotoxicity but not in the antibacterial activity.
Literature.Author: Panteleev PV, Myshkin MY, Shenkarev ZO, Ovchinnikova TV
